thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Jeanne Carney
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Jeanne Carney

author: Jeanne Carney
title: Jeanne Carney
text: I've been patronizing Ruby Lane for many years, and I've never been disappointed with either the quality of the merchandise, the promptness of the sellers in sending what I've bought, or the multiplicity of drool-worthy items - I can only wish! Thank you for giving me lots of eye candy to dream about.
